00017 PduFactory::PduFactory(){
00018         MT_LOGINIT(PduFactory)
00019 
00020         smppHelper = new SMPPHelper();

00026 Smpp::SubmitSm *PduFactory::createSubmitSm(const std::string &to,
00027                 const std::string &from, MessagePart part, CodingScheme cs = UCS2,
00028                 uint8_t registeredDelivery = 0x00, uint8_t esmClass = 0x00){
00029 
00030         Smpp::SubmitSm* sm = NULL;
00031         try {
00032                 sm = new Smpp::SubmitSm();
00033                 //sm->service_type(serviceType.c_str());
00034 
00035                 sm->source_addr(smppHelper->createSmeAdress(from));
00036                 sm->destination_addr(smppHelper->createSmeAdress(to));
00037 
00038                 sm->data_coding(cs);
00039                 sm->registered_delivery(registeredDelivery);
00040 
00041                 char* msgBody  = part.first;
00042                 uint32_t msgBodyLen = part.second;
00043 
00044                 std::cout<<"body length: "<<msgBodyLen<<std::endl;
00045 
00046                 sm->esm_class(esmClass);
00047 
00048                 sm->short_message((const Smpp::Uint8*) msgBody, msgBodyLen);
00049         } catch (std::exception e) {
00050                 MT_LOGWARNING("can't create submit sm pdu. exception("<< e.what()<<")");
00051                 delete sm;
00052                 return NULL;
00053         }
00054         return sm;
00055 
00056 }
00057

00059

00062 Smpp::DeliverSm* PduFactory::createDeliverSm(const std::string &to,
00063                 const std::string &from, const std::string &body, uint8_t esm_class) {
00064         Smpp::DeliverSm* sm = NULL;
00065         try {
00066                 sm = new Smpp::DeliverSm();
00067                 sm->service_type(m_serviceType.c_str());
00068                 sm->esm_class(esm_class);
00069                 sm->source_addr(smppHelper->createSmeAdress(from));
00070                 sm->destination_addr(smppHelper->createSmeAdress(to));
00071 
00072                 sm->registered_delivery(0x00000000);
00073                 sm->short_message((const Smpp::Uint8*) body.c_str(), body.length());
00074                 sm->insert_8bit_tlv(0x0427, 2);
00075                 sm->insert_string_tlv(0x001e, std::string(body));
00076         }
00077         catch (std::exception e) {
00078                 MT_LOGWARNING("can't create pdu. " << e.what())
00079                 delete sm;
00080                 return NULL;
00081         }
00082         return sm;
00083 }
